snippet.title: RetroShooti「★ALLSTAR★シューターポン by LUCCA」
snippet.description:
RetroShooti OST Vol. I now available @ https://mmzrecords.bandcamp.com/album/retroshooti-vol-i

It's RetroShooti! A totally ridiculous shoot 'em up fantasy from the imagination of artist Kid MarsCat☆! Fight through more than 30 levels on this crazy galactic trip and face the wackiest bosses and foes! Or battle with friends in local Co-op and Vs. game modes! Go, Shooti, Go ミ☆! 

Half-trailer, half-music clip for ★ALLSTAR★シューターポン by Lucca, part of the original soundtrack for RetroShooti.

Get the free demo, wishlist us @ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1390290/RetroShooti/
Play the free demo on your browser @ https://mmzgames.itch.io/retroshooti
You can play it on Newgrounds, too! https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/760336

© 2018 - 2021, Mesmerize Games
